purpose: Enrich CV data for opportunity matching via LangGraph workflow and capture clarifications to strengthen her resume

questions.question: Which HR functional areas are you targeting for your next role?
questions.matching_use: Primary function filter aligned to high‑demand NZ HR roles

questions.question: At what seniority level are you seeking your next position?
questions.matching_use: Seniority band alignment for salary and scope calibration

questions.question: What size of team have you directly led or managed?
questions.matching_use: Leadership scope matching for management‑level roles

questions.question: Which stakeholder levels have you partnered with? (Select all that apply)
questions.matching_use: Aligns candidate experience with stakeholder scope required in roles

questions.question: Which employment relations/industrial relations activities have you managed?
questions.matching_use: Identifies depth of ER/IR expertise for specialist roles

questions.question: What HR specialisms are you most experienced in? (Select all that apply)
questions.matching_use: Maps candidate expertise to specialist HR vacancies

questions.question: Which HR/people technology platforms and analytics tools are you proficient in?
questions.matching_use: Technology stack filter for HRIS and analytics roles

questions.question: What is your preferred work arrangement?
questions.follow_up: If Hybrid: How many days per week would you expect to be on‑site?
questions.matching_use: Ensures alignment with employers’ in‑office requirements

questions.question: Where are you willing to work? (Select all that apply)
questions.matching_use: Geographic filter that reflects NZ’s flexible location preferences

questions.question: What employment type(s) are you open to?
questions.matching_use: Filters opportunities by contract type

questions.question: What is your notice period or earliest availability?
questions.matching_use: Aligns start date expectations with hiring timelines

questions.question: Which sectors do you prefer to work in? (Select all that apply)
questions.matching_use: Industry alignment for targeted role matching

questions.question: What is your work eligibility status in New Zealand?
questions.matching_use: Determines legal work rights for employers

questions.question: What is your level of familiarity with te ao Māori and tikanga in the workplace?
questions.matching_use: Important for public sector roles and organisations valuing Māori cultural competency

questions.question: What is your salary expectation range in NZD?
questions.matching_use: Compensation band matching for salary calibration

questions.question: Please confirm the correct end date for your 'Talent & Recruitment Manager' role at Kāinga Ora (currently listed as 05/2022 to 20/2022).
questions.matching_use: Corrects resume chronology and avoids date ambiguity

questions.question: For your ServiceNow Product Owner role, can you provide quantifiable results (e.g., number of workflows designed, percentage reduction in processing time or improvement in user satisfaction)?
questions.matching_use: Adds measurable impact to resume achievements

questions.question: How many team members did you lead in your Talent & Recruitment Manager and Manager People Partners & Advisory roles?
questions.matching_use: Clarifies leadership scale in managerial positions

questions.question: In your Strategic People Partner role, what levels of leadership did you partner with (e.g., middle management, C‑suite) and roughly how many people or business units were in your portfolio?
questions.matching_use: Clarifies partnership scope and seniority exposure

questions.question: Would you like to share any context about your career break (2010–2014) such as relocation, family responsibilities, study or volunteering? (optional)
questions.matching_use: Optional context helps explain gaps without asking sensitive details

questions.question: In your Outsourcing Specialist role across the UK and continental Europe, approximately how many mergers & acquisitions or TUPE transitions did you support, and what was your primary contribution?
questions.matching_use: Clarifies scope and impact of M&A experience

questions.question: Across your earlier HR Business Partner roles at Unisys and Housing New Zealand, which industries or business functions did you support? (Select all that apply)
questions.matching_use: Industry alignment and breadth of exposure

workflow_notes.suggested_flow: Start with role preferences, seniority and work arrangement questions, then capture skills and specialisms, followed by eligibility and compensation; resume clarifications can be asked at the end as optional improvements
workflow_notes.conditional_questions: If work_arrangement is Hybrid then ask number of on‑site days; ServiceNow metrics and team size questions may trigger follow‑ups to quantify achievements
workflow_notes.optional_vs_required: Salary expectation and career break context are optional; resume clarification questions are recommended but not mandatory
